articles.description: Nintendo has announced a new promotion for Switch Online in which it’s bringing back a series of icons that were released throughout the year. Eight games will be featured in total. Super Mario Galaxy + Super Mario Galaxy 2, F-Zero 99, Kirby and the Forgotten…

articles.title: Pixel Camera brings Photo Sphere-esque Panorama mode to Pixel 8 - 9to5Google
